name: Eternal Night (Emmy_x3x, Elliot Jermy, DrgnSlyrVic, Kian Bennett, Dogmut)
name_original: Eternal Night (Emmy_x3x, Elliot Jermy, DrgnSlyrVic, Kian Bennett, Dogmut)
description:
Eternal night is a third person strategy game where you play as a witch who has stolen the sun and uses spells to fight off the angry farmers! Scavenge the town to find and collect mana to buy cards to put down your defences against the farmers! While they attack you can also shoot magic with your wand to damage them. A game made in 1 week for the GJL Game jam 2020!

We are aware of some issues that weren't able to be solved within the time limit, such as buttons not working and mana consumption problems. 

Link to Google Drive upload project files: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ydZFf1hIfS6c5Nhzu6oVDyVS5nNHXG9D/view?usp=shari...

Controls:

1 - card select one

2 - card select two

3 - card select three

WASD - move

Right mouse click - Aiming & cancel card placement

Left mouse click - Shoot & place card

Developers:

Kian - Programmer and 3D animator

Elliot - Programmer and level designer

Emily - 3D character artist and 2D artist

Vic - 3D Environment artist and logo designer

Harley - Designer
